channel.title: Bug in toxic waste lake.
channel.description:
Good day, i have a bug what i can't solve..
The bug these in this part:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A1c8wPzYnvQ&feature=related']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A1c8wPzYnvQ&feature=related[/url]
Yes, this is not my video, only want say the site where is the problem.
when i get to this part, it gives me the screen completely black, only see the numbers of health and armor.
the only way to see it is discharging as there is when I do the screen takes a red but when shooting ends returns to previous form and to see normally again, I have to re-appear or get out of the game and re-enter.
[COLOR='PaleGreen']Windows XP 32b ATI Radeon X1050 1064 GB RAM Free space harddisc 72GB Intel Celeron 1.8 Ghz
Look a some images.
[img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/577841549924424623/0DDBFD2566395D7DE3AEC4ED8DB3AFA8BAACFB27/[/img]
[img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/577841549924430611/AABBA47FA60495C276639C1A2C238A77EB322A7D/[/img]
This is what i mean. [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/577841549924428177/F15CF7A2EE95688812A9F75433C7EA611A26B497/[/img]

item.title: Bug in toxic waste lake.
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
Related to old hardware, disabling the noise filter in the black mesa options tab should fix it

Read full topic

item.title: Bug in toxic waste lake.

item.description:
Good day, i have a bug what i can’t solve…

The bug these in this part:

Yes, this is not my video, only want say the site where is the problem.

when i get to this part, it gives me the screen completely black, only see the numbers of health and armor.

the only way to see it is discharging as there is when I do the screen takes a red but when shooting ends returns to previous form and to see normally again, I have to re-appear or get out of the game and re-enter.
